channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 寒流袭上海 迎来40年来最冷年末
item.description: Shanghai was set to record its chilliest period in December in four decades with weather warnings for low temperatures and wind issued on Thursday, as the Chinese financial capital entered a days-long cold snap.翻译:随着上海进入为期数天的寒流，上海将于周四发布低温和大风天气警报，预计十二月将创下四十年来最寒冷的时期。
item.author: Casey Hall

item.title: 中国地震后仍有十几人失踪
item.description: A dozen people were still missing on Thursday after a 6.2-magnitude earthquake struck northwestern Gansu province late Monday and netizens questioned the speed at which rescue operations ended.翻译:周一晚间甘肃省西北部发生6.2级地震，周四仍有十几人失踪，网友质疑救援行动结束的速度。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 华尔街涨势停滞，亚洲股市下跌
item.description: Asian shares fell on Thursday after Wall Street snapped a long winning streak, while Treasury yields were near five-month lows on hopes Britain's notably soft inflation reading would be echoed in looming U.S. price data.翻译:华尔街结束了长期上涨势头后，亚洲股市周四下跌，而美国国债收益率接近五个月低点，因为人们希望英国明显疲软的通胀数据能够与即将公布的美国价格数据相呼应。
item.author: Julie Zhu

item.title: 中国将妈祖“和平女神”宗教作为台湾选举的武器
item.description: The Chinese Communist Party (CCP) is ramping up exchanges with folk religious groups in rural Taiwan in an attempt to manipulate political opinion in Beijing's favour ahead of elections next month, according to Taiwan government documents and security officials.翻译:台湾政府文件和安全官员称，中国共产党正在加强与台湾农村民间宗教团体的交流，试图在下个月的选举前操纵政治舆论，使之有利于北京。
item.author: James Pomfret, Yimou Lee

item.title: 随着零售商寻求接触中国消费者的新方式，“代购”走向企业化
item.description: Daigou translates as 'buying on behalf of'. Before the pandemic, millions of Chinese made a living by buying items that were cheaper overseas and then reselling them inside China.翻译:代购翻译为“代表购买”。在大流行之前，数百万中国人通过购买海外更便宜的商品然后在国内转售来谋生。
item.author: Casey Hall, Stella Qiu

item.title: 股市下跌，美元企稳
item.description: The dollar found a footing on Thursday as a sudden end to a strong rally for U.S. stocks had investors looking for safety and as an unexpected fall in British inflation hit the pound.翻译:美元周四站稳脚跟，因为美国股市强劲反弹的突然结束让投资者寻求安全，而英国通胀意外下降也打击了英镑。
item.author: Tom Westbrook

item.title: 美国参议员马可·卢比奥呼吁拜登制裁中国芯片公司灿芯半导体
item.description: Republican lawmaker Marco Rubio on Wednesday urged the Biden administration to sanction Chinese chip design firm Brite Semiconductor over its ties to China's top sanctioned chipmaker and its work for Chinese military suppliers.翻译:共和党议员马可·卢比奥周三敦促拜登政府制裁中国芯片设计公司灿芯半导体，因为该公司与中国最受制裁的芯片制造商有联系，并为中国军事供应商提供服务。
item.author: Alexandra Alper

item.title: 监管机构批准后波音接近恢复中国 737 MAX 交付 - 报告
item.description: Boeing has won a key clearance from China's aviation regulator, moving it a step closer to resuming deliveries of 737 MAX aircraft to the country after a more than four-year freeze, trade publication The Air Current said on Wednesday.翻译:贸易出版物《气流》周三表示，波音公司已获得中国航空监管机构的重要许可，使其在四年多的冻结之后恢复向中国交付 737 MAX 飞机又近了一步。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 欧盟将对中国生物柴油倾销指控展开调查
item.description: The European Union said on Wednesday it would begin an anti-dumping investigation into biodiesel imports from China, which the bloc's industry says has slashed domestic production.翻译:欧盟周三表示，将对从中国进口的生物柴油展开反倾销调查，欧盟业界称中国生产的生物柴油已大幅削减国内产量。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 比利时总理在间谍指控后将中国视为“敌对”国家
item.description: Belgian Prime Minister Alexandre de Croo on Wednesday described China as a "sometimes very hostile" country, following allegations that Beijing had recruited a member of the Belgian far-right party Vlaams Belang as an intelligence asset.翻译:比利时首相亚历山大·德克罗周三将中国描述为一个“有时非常敌对”的国家，此前有指控称北京招募了比利时极右翼党派弗拉姆斯·贝朗(Vlaams Belang)的一名成员作为情报人员。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 美国导弹防御提案在帕劳引发争论
item.description: A proposal for permanent deployment of U.S. Patriot missile defense batteries in Palau in response to China's expanding reach in the Pacific has come under fire as the nation's politicians debate the move ahead of elections next year.翻译:为了应对中国在太平洋地区不断扩大的影响力，在帕劳永久部署美国爱国者导弹防御系统的提议受到了批评，因为该国政界人士正在就明年选举前的这一举措进行辩论。
item.author: David Brunnstrom, Kirsty Needham

item.title: 台湾总统候选人称，在中国眼中，我们都是分裂分子
item.description: In China's eyes all three Taiwan presidential candidates are separatists, the frontrunner to be the island's next leader said on Wednesday in a fractious joint televised address with the other contenders.翻译:台湾下一任领导人的领跑者周三在与其他竞争者的联合电视讲话中表示，在中国眼中，所有三位台湾总统候选人都是分裂分子。
item.author: Ben Blanchard, Angie Teo

item.title: 美中关系：预计2024年将出现更多动荡
item.description: After a year that brought panic over spy balloons, a fight over semiconductors and an intensifying military rivalry, China and the U.S. are ending the year with an uneasy detente.翻译:经过一年的间谍气球恐慌、半导体之争以及日益激烈的军事竞争，中国和美国将以令人不安的缓和局势结束这一年。
item.author: Don Durfee, Antoni Slodkowski

item.title: 极涡减弱可能是中国大寒的罪魁祸首
item.description: The cause of a wave of bitingly cold air that swept into China and rewrote seasonal records for low temperatures may lie further north.翻译:一股刺骨的冷空气席卷中国并改写了季节性低温记录，原因可能在更北的地方。
item.author: Ryan Woo

item.title: 美国和中国仍是 2024 年最值得关注的信用评级
item.description: The U.S. and China on downgrade warnings, Turkey hoping for its first upgrade in a decade and Israel facing its first cut - plus more than 50 elections to navigate - means 2024 could bring pivotal moves in some sovereign credit ratings.翻译:美国和中国发出评级下调警告，土耳其希望十年来首次升级，以色列面临首次下调，再加上 50 多场选举需要进行，这意味着 2024 年一些主权信用评级可能会出现关键性变动。
item.author: Marc Jones

item.title: 菲律宾就南海主张斥责中国
item.description: The Philippine defence minister rebuked China on Wednesday for accusing his country of provoking tension and stirring trouble in the South China Sea, saying only Beijing believed what it was saying.翻译:菲律宾国防部长周三斥责中国指责菲律宾在南海挑起紧张局势并煽动麻烦，称只有北京相信其所说的话。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国地震灾民在零下严寒中被安全救出
item.description: Braving sub-zero cold, rescuers on Wednesday pulled to safety victims of an earthquake that rocked a remote area in China's northwestern Gansu province, while survivors faced months of uncertainty ahead without permanent shelter.翻译:周三，救援人员冒着零度以下的寒冷，将中国西北部甘肃省偏远地区地震的受害者救出，而幸存者将面临未来几个月的不确定性，没有永久的住所。
item.author: Alessandro Diviggiano, Xiaoyu Yin, Liz Lee

item.title: 股市转红，国债下跌，经济数据成为焦点
item.description: MSCI's global equities index fell more than 1% on Wednesday after nine straight days of gains while Treasury yields fell as U.S. economic data beat expectations and UK inflation slowed at a rate that took markets by surprise.翻译:摩根士丹利资本国际 (MSCI) 全球股票指数在连续九个交易日上涨后，周三下跌逾 1%，而美国经济数据好于预期以及英国通胀放缓速度令市场意外，美国国债收益率下跌。
item.author: Sinéad Carew

item.title: 李氏家族将通过交易走出价值陷阱
item.description: Li Ka-shing, Asia’s original tycoon, converted to shareholder religion nearly a decade ago when he carved up his Hong Kong-based empire. Though investors supported the deal, they have rapidly lost faith in the company as Sino-American tensions rise. Solving the value conundrum will be a top priority for his son Victor Li in 2024.翻译:亚洲最初的大亨李嘉诚在近十年前瓜分其香港帝国时皈依了股东信仰。尽管投资者支持这笔交易，但随着中美紧张局势加剧，他们很快对该公司失去了信心。解决价值难题将是他的儿子李泽钜2024年的首要任务。
item.author: Una Galani

item.title: 中国维持贷款基准利率不变
item.description: Market watchers expect Beijing to deliver further monetary easing into the new year.翻译:市场观察人士预计，北京将在新的一年进一步实施货币宽松政策。
item.author: Reuters
